1.title: Word of the Day: Banana

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: With the help of Liesel's friend Phil, Mr. Clown learns that the Word of the Day "Banana" has nowhere near as many N's and A's as he thought it did.

2.title: Learning Names with Mr. Clown: Phil

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel are shocked and just a little bit confused when their friend Phil teaches them the secret behind properly spelling and saying his name.

3.title: Word of the Day: Back

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: With the help of Liesel's friend Phil, Mr. Clown learns that the Word of the Day "Banana" has nowhere near as many N's and A's as he thought it did.

1.title: Word of the Day: Blanket

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel have fun teaching and learning the Word of the Day "Blanket" when Mr. Clown uses his blanket to get all cuddly cozy.

2.title: Word of the Day: Pumpkin

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Mr. Clown thinks of a silly and fun use for a pumpkin.

3.title: Word of the Day: Sunglasses

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel look way cool wearing this Word of the Day.

4.title: Word of the Day: Spoon

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Spoons come in many wonderful sizes that Mr. Clown can use to eat his favorite foods.

5.title: Word of the Day: Chocolate

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Mr. Clown wants to eat this tasty Word of the Day so very much.

6.title: Word of the Day: Cereal

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Liesel spills the Word of the Day and Mr. Clown asks her to please clean it up.

7.title: Word of the Day: Nose

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Mr. Clown's and Liesel's noses look very different, but they're both spelled the same. Pixie sky is the limit for me.

8.title: Word of the Day: Phone

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Mr. Clown gets a little confused about the difference between how the word Phone looks and how it's spelled.

9.title: Word of the Day: Milk

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Liesel goes a little crazy for milk when she and Mr. Clown start spelling it.

10.title: Word of the Day: Monkey

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Mr. Clown definitely starts monkeying around while spelling monkey.

11.title: Word of the Day: Pencil

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Pencils are for writing and for erasing and for spelling.

12.title: Word of the Day: Cat

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Mr. Clown's adorable kitty cat is happy to help spell the Word of the Day.

13.title: Word of the Day: Flashlight

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Flashlight is a very long word to spell, but it's very good for scaring away monsters.

14.title: Word of the Day: Bread

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: Mr. Clown is very happy that freshly-baked bread is the Word of the Day.

15.title: Word of the Day: Egg

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: Mr. Clown learns that eggs are everything they're cracked up to be.

16.title: Word of the Day: Glass

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: Mr. Clown gets to try out the coolest type of glass ever - Google Glass.

17.title: Word of the Day: Stretch

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

17.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel have fun teaching and learning the Word of the Day "Stretch" when they stretch their legs and Liesel discovers that clowns are much more flexible than humans.

18.title: Word of the Day: Comb

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: Billy Harris stops by to show Mr. Clown and Liesel how to use a comb on his amazing hair.

19.title: Word of the Day: Voice

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel's friend Maurice LaMarche stops by and they listen to all the amazing voices he can create just with his own voice.

20.title: Word of the Day: Pompadour

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

20.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel's friend Billy Harris stops by to show them what a pompadour is and how you style your hair into one.

21.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Consideration

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

21.plot: Caryn has fun teaching Mr. Clown that being polite means always taking your friends' needs and feelings into consideration.

22.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Phone Call

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

22.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown about the polite way to make a phone call.

23.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Finished Eating

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

23.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown about the polite way to excuse yourself from the table after you're finished eating.

24.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Talking with Your Mouth Full

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

24.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown that it's not polite to talk with your mouth full of food.

25.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Thank You Note

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

25.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown that after you receive a gift from someone, you should always write them a thank you note.

26.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Using a Napkin

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

26.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown about the polite way to use a napkin at the table.

27.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Phone at the Table

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

27.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown that it's not polite to use your cell phone to text your friends when you're at the table eating with others.

28.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Excuse Me

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

28.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown that if you want to get someone's attention, you should say "excuse me" instead of just interrupting them.

29.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Food on Face

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

29.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown that you can always quietly tell your friends when they have food on their faces.

30.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Sneezing

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

30.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown about the polite way to sneeze.

31.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Shaking Hands

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

31.plot: When good friend Liesel stops by, Caryn has fun teaching Mr. Clown how to greet people with a handshake.

32.title: Mr. Clown's Manners with Caryn: Gloating

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

32.plot: Caryn teaches Mr. Clown that it's not polite to gloat and brag.

33.title: Mr. Clown's the Alphabet Song with Jimmy

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

33.plot: Mr. Clown and Jimmy lead their friends in teaching, learning and singing The Alphabet Song.

1.title: Word of the Day: Three

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel have fun teaching the Word of the Day "Three" when Liesel's sister Allison and cousin Camryn stop by to tell Mr. Clown that the three of them want to help him learn the Word of the Day.

2.title: Word of the Day: House

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel have fun teaching and learning the Word of the Day "House" when Liesel, Liesel's sister Allison, and Mr. Clown notice that Liesel's cousin Camryn is making some really interesting gestures with her hands.

3.title: Word of the Day: Point

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel have fun teaching and learning the Word of the Day "Point" when Liesel's cousin Camryn stops by to make sure that Mr. Clown is getting the point.

4.title: Word of the Day: Twins

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel have fun teaching and learning the Word of the Day "Twins" when Mr. Clown meets Liesel's twin sister Allison and learns that not all twins are identical!

5.title: Word of the Day: Cat #2

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Mr. Clown and Liesel have fun teaching and learning the Word of the Day "Cat" when Liesel's sister Allison brings her kitty cat over for Liesel, her cousin Camryn, and Mr. Clown to meet.

6.title: Word of the Day: Great

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Liesel and her brother Raymond can't stop telling Mr. Clown how great he is, which is great because "Great" is the Word of the Day.

7.title: Word of the Day: We

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Liesel's brother Raymond stops by and joins Mr. Clown for a dance party, which Liesel is not very happy about because first they need to spell the sight word "We."

8.title: Word of the Day: Mother

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Mr. Clown is ready to end the show when he hears that Liesel didn't bring an example of the Word of the Day like she had promised to do, but luckily Monica and her mother Selma save the day.

9.title: Word of the Day: Me

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Mr. Clown, Liesel, and friends Lily and Dom are all very glad when they realize that this Word of the Day is all about the coolest person in the world...ME!.

10.title: Word of the Day: Man

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Mr. Clown doesn't want to spell the Word of the Day "man" because only Liesel and her friend Lily are there to spell it, but luckily Lily brought along her friend Dom who IS a man, and who wants to help everyone spell it.

11.title: Word of the Day: Us

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Mr. Clown, Liesel, and Dom are so happy you're going to learn the Word of the Day "us" with us.

12.title: Word of the Day: Name

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Mr. Clown, Liesel, and Dom learn each others' names when they spell the Word of the Day "name."

13.title: Learning Names with Mr. Clown: Domenick

episode of.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: Join Mr. Clown and Liesel as they have fun teaching, spelling, and talking about the name Domenick.

locations: Los Angeles, California, USA::(Universal City, CA)
imdb.title: The Adventures of Mr. Clown
akas: The Adventures of Mr. Clown (United States)
plot: _The Adventures of Mr. Clown_ (qv) is a comedic children's educational series focused on helping children overcome the Word Gap so they can ultimately achieve success in life.::_The Adventures of Mr. Clown_ (qv)
